variables.systemDescription: Samsung Gear VR is a mobile virtual reality headset developed by Samsung Electronics in collaboration with Oculus. Released in 2015, it utilized compatible Samsung Galaxy smartphones as its display and processor. It was a key pioneer in bringing accessible, wireless VR experiences to the mass market, hosting a variety of immersive games and cinematic experiences.
